title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Education
body: The Obed: A wild Classroom Wildlife and wild lands holds adventure for your students, whether you're able to visit in person, or not. Find lesson plans, plan your field trip, and more as you use Obed Wild and Scenic River as your classroom. Look to the park for your own professional development needs.   Contact the Environmental Education Office at 423-286-9059, or by e-mail.
